examples.code:
[row]
  [column sm="6"] ... [/column]
  [column sm="6"] ... [/column]
[/row]

examples.note: The container component is also supported in case your theme doesn't include a container.
examples.code:
[container]
  [row]
    [column xs="6"] ... [/column]
    [column xs="6"] ... [/column]
  [/row]
[/container]

examples.note: The container-fluid component is supported as a discrete shortcode.
examples.code:
[container-fluid]  
[row]
    [column xs="6"] ... [/column]
    [column xs="6"] ... [/column]
  [/row]
[/container-fluid]

parameters.name: xs
parameters.description: Size of column on extra small screens.

parameters.name: sm
parameters.description: Size of column on small screens.

parameters.name: md
parameters.description: Size of column on medium screens.

parameters.name: lg
parameters.description: Size of column on large screens.

parameters.name: xl
parameters.description: Size of column on extra large screens.

parameters.name: offset_xs
parameters.description: Offset on extra small screens.

parameters.name: offset_sm
parameters.description: Offset on small screens.

parameters.name: offset_md
parameters.description: Offset on medium screens.

parameters.name: offset_lg
parameters.description: Offset on large screens.

parameters.name: offset_xl
parameters.description: Offset on extra large screens.

parameters.name: pull_xs
parameters.description: Pull on extra small screens.

parameters.name: pull_sm
parameters.description: Pull on small screens.

parameters.name: pull_md
parameters.description: Pull on medium screens.

parameters.name: pull_lg
parameters.description: Pull on large screens.

parameters.name: pull_xl
parameters.description: Pull on extra large screens.

parameters.name: push_xs
parameters.description: Push on extra small screens.

parameters.name: push_sm
parameters.description: Push on small screens.

parameters.name: push_md
parameters.description: Push on medium screens.

parameters.name: push_lg
parameters.description: Push on large screens.

parameters.name: push_xl
parameters.description: Push on extra large screens.

examples.code:
[media] [media-object] [/media-object] [media-body] [media-heading]

Media Heading

[/media-heading] ... [/media-body] [/media]

examples.note: Wrap several [media-object]s in [media-list], useful for comment threads or articles lists.
examples.code:
[media-list] [media] [media-object] [/media-object] [media-body] [media-heading]

Media Heading

[/media-heading] ... [/media-body] [/media] [media] [media-object] [/media-object] [media-body] [media-heading]

Media Heading

[/media-heading] ... [/media-body] [/media] [/media-list]

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Whether the image pulls to the left or right.

shortcodes.name: media-heading
shortcodes.note: [media-heading] should contain heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a header tag is not added h4 will be inserted automatically.

examples.code: [hidden down="sm"] ... [/hidden]

parameters.name: up
parameters.description: Hide the contents on this screen size and above.

parameters.name: down
parameters.description: Hide the contents on this screen size and below.

items.title: Alerts
items.note: Any links, headings, or strong or bold text within an alert will automatically be styled to match the alert type.

examples.code: [alert type="primary"] ... [/alert]
[alert type="primary" dismissible] ... [/alert]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the alert.
parameters.values: primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, light, dark

parameters.name: dismissible
parameters.description: If the alert should be dismissable.

examples.code: [badge type="primary"] Lorem [/badge]
[badge type="primary" pill] Ipsum [/badge]
[badge type="primary"] Dolor Sit [/badge]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the badge.
parameters.values: primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, light, dark

parameters.name: pill
parameters.description: If the badge should be styled as a pill.

examples.note: Remember that [breadcrumb] must wrap a set of links inserted via the WordPress editor.
examples.code: [breadcrumb] Link 1 Link 2 [active] Link 3 [/active] [/breadcrumb]

items.title: Buttons
items.note: Wrap any a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor in [button] to give it button properties and classes.

examples.code: [button type="primary"] Button Text [/button]

examples.note: Set button sizes with the size parameter.
examples.code: [button type="primary" size="lg"] Button Text [/button]

examples.note: Set block flag for block-style buttons.
examples.code: [button type="primary" block] Button Text [/button]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the button.
parameters.values: primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, light, dark, link, outline-primary, outline-secondary, outline-success, outline-info, outline-warning, outline-danger, outline-light, outline-dark

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the button.

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: Flag whether the button should be a block-level button.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Flag whether the button should styled as active.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Flag whether the button should styled as disabled.

items.title: Button Groups
items.note: Remember that [button] must wrap an a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor.

examples.code: [button-group] [button type="secondary"] [active]Text[/active] [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [/button-group]

examples.note: Set the vertical flag to make the buttons appear vertically stacked rather than horiztonally.
examples.code: [button-group vertical] [button type="secondary"] [active]Text[/active] [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [/button-group]

examples.note: Wrap [button group]s in [button-toolbar] to make a button toolbar.
examples.code: [button-toolbar] [button-group] [button type="secondary"] [active]Text[/active] [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [/button-group] [button-group] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [button type="secondary"] Text [/button] [/button-group] [button-group] [button type="secondary"] [disabled]Text[/disabled] [/button] [/button-group] [/button-toolbar]

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the button.

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.description: Flag whether the button is vertical.

examples.code:
[card]
  [card-body]
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit.
  [/card-body]
[/card]

examples.note: List groups are suppored by adding the flush flag to the [list-group] shortcode.
examples.code:
[card] [list-group flush]
  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Vestibulum at eros
[/list-group] [/card]

[card] [card-img top] [/card-img] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title]

Lorm ipsum dolor sit amet.

[/card-body] [list-group flush]
  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Vestibulum at eros
[/list-group] [card-body] Lorem Ipsup Dolor Sit [/card-body] [/card]

examples.note: Image caps are supported with the [card-img] shortcode and the top or bottom flag.
examples.code:
[card] [card-img top] [/card-img] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/card-body] [/card]

examples.note: Image overlay cards are supported with the [card-img-overlay] shortcode.
examples.code:
[card] [card-img] [/card-img] [card-img-overlay] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/card-img-overlay] [/card]

examples.note: Card header and card footers are supported with the [card-header] and [card-footer] shortcodes.
examples.code:
[card] [card-header] Example Header [/card-header] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/card-body] [card-footer] Example footer. [/card-footer] [/card]

examples.note: Use card groups to render cards as a single, attached element with equal width and height columns.
examples.code:
[card-group] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/card-body] [/card] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Cras justo odio. [/card-body] [/card] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Dapibus ac facilisis in. [/card-body] [/card] [/card-group]

examples.note: Need a set of equal width and height cards that arenâ€™t attached to one another? Use card decks.
examples.code:
[card-deck] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/card-body] [/card] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Cras justo odio. [/card-body] [/card] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Dapibus ac facilisis in. [/card-body] [/card] [/card-deck]

examples.note: Cards can be organized into Masonry-like columns with just CSS by wrapping them in [card-columns]
examples.code:
[card-columns] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/card-body] [/card] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Cras justo odio. [/card-body] [/card] [card] [card-body] [card-title]
Card Title
[/card-title] Dapibus ac facilisis in. [/card-body] [/card] [/card-columns]

shortcodes.name: card-body
shortcodes.note: Any p or blockquote tags within [card-body] will automatically receive card-text or card-bodyquote classes respectively

shortcodes.name: card-title
shortcodes.note: [card-title] should contain a heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a heading tag is not added h4 will be inserted automatically

shortcodes.name: card-subtitle
shortcodes.note: [card-subtitle] should contain a heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a heading tag is not added h6 will be inserted automatically

shortcodes.name: card-img
shortcodes.note: [card-img] should contain an image inserted using the WordPress editor.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Flag whether this image cap is at the top of the card.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.description: Flag whether this image cap is at the bottom of the card.

shortcodes.name: card-header
shortcodes.note: [card-header] should contain a heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a heading tag is not added div (no heading) will be inserted automatically

items.title: Carousel
items.note: Remember that [carousel] must wrap a set of images inserted via the WordPress editor.

examples.code: [carousel] [/carousel]
[carousel controls] [/carousel]
[carousel controls indicators] [/carousel]

parameters.name: controls
parameters.description: Whether to show carousel controls.

parameters.name: indicators
parameters.description: Whether to show position indicators.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling an item. If false, carousel will not automatically cycle.

parameters.name: pause
parameters.description: Whether the carousel pauses on hover. If set to null, hovering over the carousel won't pause it.

parameters.name: wrap
parameters.description: Whether the carousel should cycle continuously or have hard stops.

examples.note: Create an accordion by wrapping [card]s in [accordion].
examples.code:
[accordion]
  [card]
    [card-header] ... [/card-header]
    [card-body]
      ...
    [/card-body]
  [/card]
  [card]
    [card-header] ... [/card-header]
    [card-body]
      ...
    [/card-body]
  [/card]
[/accordion]

items.title: Dropdowns
items.note: Remember that [dropdown-menu] must wrap an a, or button tags inserted via the WordPress editor.

examples.note: The dropdown flag must be used on a [button] shortcode for dropdowns to work.
examples.code: [dropdown] [button dropdown]Dropdown Button[/button] [dropdown-menu] Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 [/dropdown-menu] [/dropdown]

examples.note: Add a header to label sections of actions in any dropdown menu.
examples.description: Dropdown with header tags as labels
examples.code:
[dropdown] [button dropdown]Dropdown Button[/button] [dropdown-menu]
Dropdown header
Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 [/dropdown-menu] [/dropdown]

examples.note: Separate groups of related menu items with a [dropdown-divider].
examples.code: [dropdown] [button dropdown]Dropdown Button[/button] [dropdown-menu] Link 1 [dropdown-divider] Link 2 Link 3 [/dropdown-menu] [/dropdown]

examples.note: Create split button dropdowns with [button-group] and the dropdown and split
examples.code: [button-group] [button]Button[/button] [button dropdown split][/button] [dropdown-menu] Link 1 [dropdown-divider] Link 2 Link 3 [/dropdown-menu] [/button-group]

examples.note: Set the dropup or dropright flags to set these variations.
examples.code: [dropdown dropup] [button dropdown]Dropdown Button[/button] [dropdown-menu] Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 [/dropdown-menu] [/dropdown]

parameters.name: dropup
parameters.description: Set dropup variation.

parameters.name: dropright
parameters.description: Set dropright variation.

parameters.name: align
parameters.description: Alignment of the dropdown menu.

examples.code:
[jumbotron]

Hello, World!

[lead] This is a simple hero unit, a simple jumbotron-style component for calling extra attention to featured content or information. [/lead] [/jumbotron]

examples.note: Set the fluid flag to make a fluid jumbotron.
examples.code:
[jumbotron fluid]

Hello, World!

[lead] This is a simple hero unit, a simple jumbotron-style component for calling extra attention to featured content or information. [/lead] [/jumbotron]

parameters.name: fluid
parameters.description: Flag whether jumbotron should be fluid.

items.title: List Group
items.note: Remember that [list-group] must wrap a set of links or list items inserted via the WordPress editor.

examples.code:
[list-group]
  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
  • Vestibulum at eros
[/list-group]

examples.note: Create a linked list by wrapping links
examples.code: [list-group] Cras justo odio [active]Dapibus ac facilisis in[/active] Morbi leo risus Porta ac consectetur ac [disabled]Vestibulum at eros[/disabled] [/list-group]

examples.note: Wrap items in the list-group-item shortcode to give them contextual styles
examples.code: [list-group] [list-group-item type="success"]Cras justo odio[/list-group-item] [list-group-item type="info"]Dapibus ac facilisis in[/list-group-item] [list-group-item type="warning"]Morbi leo risus[/list-group-item] [list-group-item type="danger"]Porta ac consectetur ac[/list-group-item] [/list-group]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the list-group-item.
parameters.values: primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, light, dark

examples.code:
[modal fade id="example-modal"] [modal-header]
Example Header
[/modal-header] [modal-body] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/modal-body] [modal-footer] [button type="secondary"] Lorem [/button] [button type="primary"] Ipsum [/button] [/modal-footer] [/modal] [button data="toggle,modal|target,#example-modal"] Launch Modal [/button]

examples.note: Use the size="large" attribute for a larger modal
examples.code:
[modal size="lg" fade id="example-modal-lg"] [modal-header]
Example Header
[/modal-header] [modal-body] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/modal-body] [modal-footer] [button type="secondary"] Lorem [/button] [button type="primary"] Ipsum [/button] [/modal-footer] [/modal] [button data="toggle,modal|target,#example-modal-lg"] Launch Large Modal [/button]

examples.note: Use the size="small" attribute for a smaller modal
examples.code:
[modal size="sm" fade id="example-modal-sm"] [modal-header]
Example Header
[/modal-header] [modal-body] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/modal-body] [modal-footer] [button type="secondary"] Lorem [/button] [button type="primary"] Ipsum [/button] [/modal-footer] [/modal] [button data="toggle,modal|target,#example-modal-sm"] Launch Small Modal [/button]

examples.note: Use the centered flag to vertically center the modal
examples.code:
[modal fade centered id="centered-modal"] [modal-header]
Example Header
[/modal-header] [modal-body] Lorem ipsum dolor sit. [/modal-body] [modal-footer] [button type="secondary"] Lorem [/button] [button type="primary"] Ipsum [/button] [/modal-footer] [/modal] [button data="toggle,modal|target,#centered-modal"] Launch Centered Modal [/button]

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of the modal (optional)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the modal (optional)

parameters.name: fade
parameters.description: Flag whether modal should use fade animation.

parameters.name: centered
parameters.description: Flag whether modal be vertically centered.

items.title: Navs
items.note: Remember that [nav] must wrap a set of links and list items inserted via the WordPress editor.

examples.code:
[nav]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

examples.note: Set the vertical flag to make a vertical nav.
examples.code:
[nav vertical]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

examples.note: Set the fill flag to force navs to the full available width.
examples.code:
[nav fill]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

examples.note: Set the justified flag to force nav-items to have equal widths.
examples.code:
[nav fill]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

examples.note: Set the tabs flag to make an tab-styled nav.
examples.code:
[nav tabs]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

examples.note: Set the pills flag to make an pills-styled nav.
examples.code:
[nav pills]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

examples.note: Pills-styled navs can also be stacked with the stacked flag.
examples.code:
[nav pills stacked]
  • [active]Cras justo odio[/active]
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
[/nav]

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: Flag whether nav should be inline.

parameters.name: tabs
parameters.description: Flag whether nav should be styled as tabs.

parameters.name: pills
parameters.description: Flag whether nav should be styled as pills.

parameters.name: stacked
parameters.description: Flag whether nav should be stacked.

items.title: Pagination
items.note: Remember that [pagination] must wrap a set of list items and links inserted via the WordPress editor.

examples.code:
[pagination]
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • »
[/pagination]

[pagination size="lg"]
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • »
[/pagination]

[pagination size="sm"]
  • «
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • »
[/pagination]

[pagination]
  • «
  • [active]1[/active]
  • 2
  • [disabled]3[/disabled]
  • »
[/pagination]

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Optional size of the pagination.

items.title: Popovers
items.note: Wrap any element in a the [popover] shortcode to give it a popover. This may not work well on all elements depending on styling and other factors.

examples.code: [popover title="Popover title" content="Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus." ]Cras justo odio[/popover]

examples.note: Use the focus trigger to dismiss popovers on the next click that the user makes.
examples.code: [popover trigger="focus" title="Popover title" content="Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus." ]Cras justo odio[/popover]

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the popover.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the popover.

parameters.name: placement
parameters.description: Placement of the popover.

parameters.name: trigger
parameters.description: The popover trigger (use focus to dismiss popover on next click).

examples.code: [progress type="primary" value="50"]

examples.note: Use the striped flag to produce a striped progress bar.
examples.code: [progress type="primary" value="50" striped]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the progress bar.

parameters.name: striped
parameters.description: Flag whether progress bar should be striped.

parameters.name: animated
parameters.description: Flag whether progress bar should be animated.

items.title: Tooltips
items.note: Wrap any element in a the [tooltip] shortcode to give it a tooltip. This may not work well on all elements depending on styling and other factors.

examples.code: [tooltip title="Tooltip text"]Cras justo odio[/tooltip]

examples.note: Use the html flag to allow HTML in the tooltip
examples.code: [tooltip title="Tooltip with HTML" tooltip]Cras justo odio[/tooltip]

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The content of the tooltip.

parameters.name: placement
parameters.description: Placement of the tooltip.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: Flag whether content should be parsed for HTML.

items.title: Borders
items.note: Use border utilities to quickly style the border and border-radius of an element. Great for images, buttons, or any other element.

examples.code: [border rounded][/border]

parameters.name: rounded
parameters.description: Flag whether border style should be rounded.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Flag whether border style should be rounded-top.

parameters.name: right
parameters.description: Flag whether border style should be rounded-right.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.description: Flag whether border style should be rounded-bottom.

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: Flag whether border style should be rounded-left.

parameters.name: circle
parameters.description: Flag whether border style should be a circle.

items.title: Colors
items.note: Convey meaning through color with a handful of emphasis utility classes. These may also be applied to links and will darken on hover just like our default link styles.

examples.code: [color type="primary"]Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris nibh.[/color]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the color to be applied.
parameters.values: muted, primary, success, info, warning, danger, white
